name: Catacombs (itch) (Funky_Mushroom)
description:
You have been confined in Hell, and the only way out is to kill all the demons.

You have a special Confine move, which freezes time for everything except you. Use this to escape tricky situations or sneak in some extra damage. Careful, you only have one use per wave! Choose and combine over 30 different items, and fight through 20 waves of intense bullet-dodging action!

Submission to the Bullet Hell Jam 2022

Don't forget to rate after playing, and leave a helpful comment about what you liked and didn't like! All criticism is welcome, as long as it's constructive.

Controls (can be read here or ingame):

WASD- Move

Left Mouse Button- Shoot

Right Mouse Button- Confine (once per wave)

T- End Wave (for if an enemy get stuck outside the map)

Middle Mouse Button- Take Item

If you have any problems, contact me and I'll do my best to help you.

Almost all assets were made within the timeframe of the gamejam, the exceptions being:

Some of the music

A custom template I use for bullet hell games (it has a character controller and title screen functionality)

Credits:

Design- Funky Mushroom

Programming- Funky Mushroom

Art- Funky Mushroom

Music and SFX- Funky Mushroom

Fonts- FontsForFlash and Funky Mushroom

Thanks for playing!
